column13:
Nutrine Garlic Shampoo - Imported (474 ml) Price: Rs.3800

Nutrine Garlic Shampoo Unscented 16oz (Pack of 2). GARLIC SHAMPOO for EXCESSIVE HAIR LOSS. CONTAINS Unscented Garlic Extract and other Natural Ingredients. Nutrine Garlic Shampoo promotes cleanser healthier hair and scalp with regular use which aids in the prevention of excessive hair loss. DIRECTIONS : Wet hair thoroughly with lukewarm water. Massage a sufficient amount of shampoo onto scalp and hair to form a rich lather. Rinse. Repeat leaving shampoo on hair for 5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. for best results use every other day for four(4) weeks and then (2) two or (3) three times a week thereafter. If exxcessive hair loss continutes consult your physician. INGREDIENTS : Deionized Water Ammonium Lauryl Ether Sulfate Cocamide DEA Sodium Lauryl Sulfate Gylcol Stearate (and) other ingredients Sodium Chloride Pure Garlic Extract Quaternium 15 Phosphric Acid Methylparaben D C Red # 33.
